sub_title: Senior Manager, WW Digital Marketing Transformation at Lenovo IDG
summary:
As a pioneer and expert in digital marketing, I have been at the forefront of pushing technological borders to meet business needs and deliver superior customer experiences. I am an accomplished hands-on B2B & B2C marketing practitioner, grounded in the principles of data-driven decision-making, who transitioned into operations to drive digital transformation across marketing. Task-orientated and solutions-focused, I am driven by the desire to meet new challenges every day. 

I am used to working in complex, high-pressure, global companies where maximizing Marketing ROI is imperative to stay competitive and meet business goals. Having built corporate websites, mobile applications, brand/demand generation campaigns, personalized nurture tracks, sales enablement, and channel partner programs across multiple languages, I am familiar with the touch points of the customer journey. I helped establish and operate paid media competence centers, B2B demand centers, and Marketing performance measurement teams throughout my career.   

I thrive on personal interaction with people from diverse backgrounds, nationalities, and skill sets. I have learned to appreciate that working in a team of complementing individuals will get you further, faster, and more personally rewarding. By means of diplomacy and enthusiasm, I positively encourage my teams to drive projects efficiently. Applying advanced planning, roadmap development, project management, and forecasting skills while simultaneously managing competing priorities helps me ensure that projects are delivered on time and within budget.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration (BSBA)

awards.title: Make A Difference Award - Embracing Innovation in All Its Forms
awards.description: Martin is being recognized for his outstanding dedication to the success of the Northern European team. Using innovation to raise awareness, drive leads, and engage clients, he consistently and proactively goes beyond his responsibilities to deliver superior service. Whether it is executing new digital marketing initiatives, creating new Moodleroom’s websites, digital client events and even helping pack boxes for a local sales event, Martin always supports the sales teams and customers with equal enthusiasm. With his dedication, team focus, passion for innovation, and focus on customers, Martin is celebrated by numerous colleagues and leaders as a true asset to Blackboard.

awards.title: Inverted Pyramid Award
awards.description: The Inverted Pyramid award is given in recognition of outstanding service to Laureate Education and its students.

certifications.name: Messaging and Campaign Planning for B-to-B Marketers
Foundations for Best Practice in Demand Creation

profile_positions.description: In my current role within the IDG Global Marketing Ops. team, I lead and represent across four key areas. 1. Marketing performance Measurement 2. Web, content & personalization strategy 3. Marketing tools & processes 4. Technology adoption, optimization & governance
profile_positions.title: Sr. Manager, IDG Global Digital Marketing Transformation

profile_positions.description: As Sr. Manager, IDG Global Commercial Solutions Marketing & Sales Enablement, I uncovered the marketing challenges related to sales enablement content dissemination, feedback loops, and gaining data insights to determine the ROI of customer-facing marketing assets. To address these challenges, I identified and evaluated appropriate best-on-class sales enablement technology platforms, passed security reviews, and negotiated the contractual terms of Highspot before company-wide global deployment.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Manager, IDG Global Solutions Marketing & Sales Enablement

profile_positions.description:
As Sr. Manager of the Global Demand Center, I was critical in driving and accelerating prospect and customer marketing initiatives by contributing to our global digital marketing and technology processes. This included: driving demand at a global scale with our enterprise-level marketing automation platform (MAP) leveraging programmatic, paid search, and paid social tactics in combination with persona-based nurture campaigns.  

As a leading member of the GDC team, I had exposure to all sides of the business, working closely with brand, field marketing, channel marketing, product marketing, and sales leaders across the globe. In my role, I had significant involvement in defining marketing and sales processes that drove efficiency and scale across the organization, led to better alignment, and contributed to an industry-leading customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Marketing Manager, Global Demand Center

profile_positions.description: As Sr. Marketing Manager, I developed, managed, and executed all aspects of our marketing programs across various channels, focusing on customer acquisition and retention in the BENELUX, DACH, and NORDIC countries. In close collaboration with central marketing, product marketing, outside agencies, and partner organizations, I implemented innovative result-driven ABM, lead generation, and brand campaigns that substantially impacted Blackboard’s competitiveness in the regions.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Marketing Manager, International Programs

profile_positions.description: As Marketing Director and co-founder, I was involved in all areas of the business. Our unique offerings, tailored to the for-profit education sector, supported our clients in recruiting qualified students for their online Masters’ programs across the globe with accurately forecasted student acquisition costs. Websizers was recognized as a marketing leader within this specialty area and received a WBSO subsidy from the Dutch government to develop innovative online marketing optimization and social media monitoring platform.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Director (Co-Founder)

profile_positions.description: As a member of the international web marketing team, I was responsible for concept development, migration, testing, and launching of new web properties. I collaborated closely with outside creative agencies, developers, and internal stakeholders to execute against business requirements to deliver personalized customer web experiences.
profile_positions.title: Manager of Web Strategy, Properties and Communities

profile_positions.description: As Manager, International Marketing, I was responsible for developing Marketing launch plans to introduce new online educational programs to the market. To support the launch and drive sufficient demand for the initial cohort, I developed a revolutionary online marketing platform that served tailored content based on region, visitor IP, and campaign tracking codes under the same domain name.
profile_positions.title: Manager, International Marketing
